dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: Hello, I'm on a quest to save the kingdom.

dialogue.speaker: NPC 1
dialogue.text: You've arrived just in time. The Dark Lord has taken over the castle.

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: I'm here to stop him! Where can I find him?

dialogue.speaker: NPC 1
dialogue.text: The Dark Lord is in the throne room, but be warned, he has a powerful army at his command.
